body.p: oXygen Publishing Template defines all the aspects related with the look and feel(layout and styles) of the WebHelp Responsive output. It represents the main method for customizing the output allowing you to:

ul.li: add additional template resources (CSS, JS) to customize the output
change the layout of the topic or main page by customizing which components will be displayed and their position in the page.
extend the default processing by specifying one or more XSLT extension points.

body.p: A oXygen Publishing Template represents a customization package that you can easily share with your team. Another benefit of this customization method is it allows you to easily upgrade from an older version of .
